extension.summary: Performs export/import/delete DB manipulation for watched flags and resume time positions for video addons.
extension.description:
How to use: In the addon settings specify the export/import files locations (if not specified, the default ones in the addon folder will be used).
The following actions is available: [B]Export[/B] - Export addons whatch states (flags and resume time positions) to a file. [B]Import[/B] - Import addons whatch states from a file. [B]View statistics / delete[/B] - Shows the amount of watched videos for any installed addon. Choosing the particular addon will delete all watched states from DB for choosen addon.
